Key Match Events: Jarrett Allen's layup off a screen gave the Cleveland Cavaliers a 115-111 lead with 14.1 seconds remaining
Darius Garland torched the Bucks for 12 of his 39 points in the final 6:06 in the game
Allen sealed the win by blocking Lillard at the rim
Post-Match Reflections: Doc Rivers addressed the Bucksâ€™ defense breakdown that allowed Allen to score deep in the paint
Doc Rivers gave props to Darius Garland for making tough shots
Doc Rivers said that the team would have to live with that performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bucks looked ready to survive the game without Giannis Antetokounmpo
Damian Lillard stepped up with another stellar showing, finishing with 36 points
Others: The Cavs closed out the game with an 18-8 run in the last six minutes
The Bucks suffered yet another heartbreaking loss to the Cavaliers
